comments:
Description:
  Using the attached file as flat file datasource.It will cause an error if the cell K19 keep blank.

Step to reproduce:
  1. new a data source base on the flat file (.csv)
  2. create a data set and prview result it in the dataset Editor.

Acutal result:
  -error message appear:
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Cannot execute the statement.
10 >= 10

	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.PreparedStatement.execute(PreparedStatement.java:567)

 -if input a value in K19 of the flat file and repeat the set to preview the result,it will ok.

Created an attachment (id=45735)
Flat source file

Attached file,thanks.
The attached flatfile is invalid as a data source. There should be a tailing comma by the end of last two line.
